projects.title: HireSight
projects.subtitle: AI Recruiting Intelligence
projects.description: An AI-powered candidate screening system built with Google Gemini. Extracts insights from resumes, scores candidates against custom criteria, and generates recruiter-ready summaries with weighted analysis. Built for speed, fairness, and transparency in hiring.

projects.title: JetSetGo
projects.subtitle: Smart Visa & Travel Intelligence
projects.description: A smart travel tool that finds visa-free and visa-on-arrival destinations for your nationality and chosen dates, then ranks them by real-time flight prices using the Amadeus API - making spontaneous trips effortless.

projects.title: LastCrumb
projects.subtitle: Real-Time Food Matching
projects.description: The first UAE-based version of the Too Good To Go concept - a mobile-first platform that lets users buy leftover restaurant meals at a discounted price. Built with Stripe for secure payments and Google Maps to surface nearby blind boxes, the system promotes food sustainability while making quality meals more affordable.

projects.title: MindPalace
projects.subtitle: Gesture-Driven Memory Interface
projects.description: An interactive memory-palace learning tool powered by hand-gesture recognition. A playful exploration of creative ML interfaces, designed with expressive UI and intuitive spatial metaphors.

projects.title: Churn Predictor
projects.subtitle: ML Platform with 90% Accuracy
projects.description: A complete machine-learning powered churn prediction app. XGBoost + SMOTE to counter class imbalance. Next.js frontend + Flask backend. Real-time predictions via REST API. Clean dashboards for insights and customer segmentation.

projects.title: Inventory Tracker
projects.subtitle: Real-Time Operations Tool
projects.description: A fast, secure inventory management system for clinics. Built with React, Next.js, Firebase, and Material-UI. Features real-time item search, add/update/remove flows, and improved operational efficiency by 25%. Includes alphabetically sorted dynamic lists.
